column4: Hello everyone, I'm very interested in helping developing linux applications, some with Java (which I know pretty good), some with C++ (which i still don't know), and I was wondering, everytime I try to download a source of a program it seems to be more complex than what I've learned so far, I've seen a couple of SVN sources (which took me some time to figure out how that works), is there a website that can has collected simple and i
material that can teach you to develop and contribute to open source projects?
